first_translate: you look beautiful as always, fiona.
second_translate: you look beautiful as always, fiona.

first_translate: you let your hair down again.
second_translate: You let your hair down again.
It looks good on you.

hangle: 너 때문에 머리를 내린 거 알고 있지?
first_translate: you know I did it because of you, right?
second_translate: You know I let my hair down because of you, right?
Me?
Yes!

hangle: 내 담당 하녀가 아직 어리고 순진한 걸 다행으로 알아.
first_translate: you should be glad my maid is young and naive.
second_translate: Consider yourself lucky that my maid is still young and naive.

first_translate: I’ll be more careful next time.
second_translate: I’ll be careful next time.

first_translate: so you’re not saying you won’t do it again.
second_translate: So you're not saying you won't do it.

first_translate: anyway! just be careful from now on.
second_translate: Anyway! Just be careful from now on.
Yeah, 'from now on.'
Siegren, why are you smiling?
Hehe.
Your Highness, Lady Fiona.

first_translate: thank you for accepting my invitation.
second_translate: Thank you for accepting the invitation.
Lady Livia.
The pleasure is mine. Thank you for inviting me.
You two,
Would you each like a drink?

first_translate: it’s a peach cocktail that I enjoy.
second_translate: It's a peach cocktail that I personally enjoy.
It’s sweet and tasty.
Wow, thank you!
You... what?
I'll switch to a non-alcoholic one.

first_translate: do you not enjoy alcohol, your highness?
second_translate: Do you not enjoy drinking, Your Highness?

hangle: 그건 아니지만, 오늘은 안 마시는 게 나을 것 같아서.
first_translate: it’s not that, but I think it’s better not to drink today.
second_translate: It’s not that, but I think it’d be better not to drink today.

first_translate: thank you for your kindness, my lady.
second_translate: I'll accept your kindness, but nothing more, my lady.
I see...
Then,

first_translate: ...may I have a drink with your partner for a moment?
second_translate: Would it be alright if I had a drink with His Highness's partner for a moment?
Wow~ It's really pretty~

first_translate: if it’s just for a moment.
second_translate: If it's just for a moment.

first_translate: is there something you want to say to me?
second_translate: Do you have something to say to me?

first_translate: you’re more straightforward than I expected.
second_translate: You're more direct than I expected, my lady.
Ah...

first_translate: I forgot how to speak like a socialite.
second_translate: I forgot to use the high society way of speaking.

first_translate: I’m used to being direct in battle.
second_translate: I'm used to speaking directly in battle.
Maybe,

first_translate: ...remember the promise you made to me?
second_translate: Do you remember the promise we made before?

hangle: “절 도우면 영애가 사교계에서 입지를 다질 수 있도록 도와줄게요.”
first_translate: “if you help me, I’ll help you establish yourself in high society.”
second_translate: "If you help me, I'll help you establish yourself in the socialite circles."
Of course.

first_translate: if it’s all right with you,
second_translate: If you’re okay with it…
Can we renew that contract?
Renew the contract?

hangle: 요즘… 황후 폐하가 눈치를 과하게 주신답니다.
first_translate: these days... her majesty has been giving me a hard time.
second_translate: These days... Her Majesty the Empress has been pressuring me too much.

first_translate: what did the empress say to her?
second_translate: what did the empress say?

hangle: 지금의 저는 황태자 전하를 쫓아낼 수 없는데요?
first_translate: I can’t get rid of the crown prince right now.
second_translate: I can't drive out the crown prince at the moment.

hangle: 물론 사람이 없는 장소에서 이미 한 대 때리기는 했지만.
first_translate: of course, I did hit him once when no one was around.
second_translate: Of course, I already took a swing at him when no one was around.

hangle: 나중에 제대로 복수도 할 거긴 하지만.
second_translate: I'll make sure to get my revenge later.

first_translate: but I’m not sure if that will be enough to help livia...
second_translate: But I'm not sure if that would be enough to actually help Livia...
I know.

hangle: 이번 경우에는 제가 영애의 가능성에 기대를 건다는 것에 가깝겠네요.
first_translate: in this case, I’m betting on your potential.
second_translate: In this case, it's more like I'm placing my hopes on your potential.

hangle: 저보다는 시그렌 전하에게 거는 게 낫지 않겠어요?
first_translate: wouldn’t it be better to bet on prince siegren instead of me?
second_translate: Wouldn't it be better to place your hopes on Prince Siegren rather than me?
I like strong people.

first_translate: I’m sure the crown prince is strong too,
second_translate: I'm sure His Highness the Prince is strong too...

hangle: 제 두 눈으로 똑똑히 확인한 건 전하 쪽이 아니라,
first_translate: but I’ve seen your skills with my own eyes,
second_translate: But what I’ve clearly seen with my own eyes wasn’t His Highness, but you.
It was your skill that I saw with my own eyes.

first_translate: I’ve seen it twice, in fact.
second_translate: I've even confirmed it twice.
Actually,

first_translate: I don’t think badly of the crown prince.
second_translate: I don’t have a bad opinion of the prince.
But.
But?

first_translate: I don’t like people who don’t remember my face...
second_translate: I don’t like it when someone doesn’t remember my face.

hangle: 하물며 다른 여자과 연관시켜서 떠올리는 분은 싫거든요.
second_translate: I don't like someone who can't even remember my face and instead associates me with another woman.

hangle: 전에 시그렌 전하와 부딪힌 적이 있는데,
first_translate: I ran into his highness before,
second_translate: I ran into Prince Siegren before,

first_translate: and when he saw me, he said...
second_translate: And when he saw my face, he said...

first_translate: oh, you’re the one who’s close to fiona.
second_translate: Oh. Someone acquainted with Fiona...
That was the first thing he said.

hangle: 이제껏 저를 한 번 보고 나서
second_translate: There's never been a man who saw me once and didn't remember me first.

hangle: 첫 번째로 떠올리지 못한 남자는 없었는데!
first_translate: ...who couldn’t remember me after seeing me once!
second_translate: There has never been a man who didn’t think of me first after seeing me once!

hangle: 저런 이야기를 하는데도 밉게 보이지가 않다니, 이것도 능력이야…
first_translate: she doesn’t seem mean even when she says things like that. that’s a talent in itself...
second_translate: Even saying things like that, she doesn’t come across as unpleasant… That’s a skill in itself.
Anyway,

hangle: 제 미래의 ‘가능성’에 기대를 걸고 도움을 주겠다는 뜻이죠?
first_translate: you’re saying you’ll help me because you’re betting on my potential, right?
second_translate: So, you’re saying you’ll help me because you’re betting on my future potential, right?

hangle: 아쉽게도 프리실라 가문이 아닌 리비아의 도움이지만요.
first_translate: it’s unfortunate that it’s not the priscilla family’s help, but livia’s.
second_translate: Unfortunately, it's Livia's help, not the Priscilla family's.

hangle: 아버지는 어디까지나 중립의 위치를 지키려 하시니까요.
first_translate: my father wants to remain neutral, after all.
second_translate: My father intends to maintain a neutral stance, after all.

hangle: 그럼, 리비아 영애가 줄 수 있는 도움은 무엇인가요?
first_translate: then what kind of help can you give me, lady livia?
second_translate: Then, what kind of help can Lady Livia provide?

hangle: 피오나 영애와 제가 사교계에서 더 친밀한 사이가 되는 거겠죠.
first_translate: it would be for you and me to become closer in high society.
second_translate: It would mean you and I becoming closer in high society.
Then wouldn't that mean...

first_translate: ...wouldn’t that mean we’re just becoming friends?
second_translate: Wouldn't that just mean we're becoming friends?
What’s with this awkward silence?!
Well, I guess that’s how it turned out...

first_translate: please take care of me from now on.
second_translate: Let's get along well from now on.
Friend.
I look forward to getting along with you too, Lady Fiona.
lady fiona.
Sig-- I mean,
Your Highness.
Did you wait long?
No.
Listen, Siegren.
Lady Livia...

first_translate: ...asked me to stay close to her.
second_translate: ...asked me to stick with her.
She's politically neutral, but...

hangle: 그거랑 별개로 황태자가 너무 싫어서 내 쪽에 힘을 실어주고픈 모양이야.
first_translate: but she hates the crown prince so much that she wants to support me.
second_translate: But aside from that, she hates the crown prince so much that she wants to support me.

hangle: 누가 들을 수도 있으니 밖으로 가자.
first_translate: someone might hear us. let’s go outside.
second_translate: Someone might overhear us. Let's step outside.
I hate that guy too.
But...

hangle: 너와 보낼 시간을 그 영애에게 빼앗기는 것도 싫은데.
first_translate: ...I don’t want her to take away the time I spend with you.
second_translate: I don’t want to have the time I spend with you taken away by her.
What?

hangle: 에이. 뭐 그런 농담을 하고 그래?
first_translate: hey, why would you joke about something like that?
second_translate: Hey, why are you joking about that?
I'm not joking.

hangle: 리비아 영애보다 나와 노는 게 더 재밌을 거야.
first_translate: it’ll be more fun to hang out with me than with lady livia.
second_translate: It'll be more fun spending time with me than with Lady Livia.
I’ll do my best to make it that way.
fiona.
